LanguageData.PJ_SettingsForceXPDelay_Num: Force XP Gain Delay ({0}x) (Tip: Lower is faster XP Gain)
LanguageData.PJ_DrainedForcePool: {0} needs to recover their force powers.
LanguageData.PJ_LevelUp: {0} has leveled up! New force points available.
LanguageData.PJ_LightsidePointsRequired: Requires {0} points spent on light side abilities
LanguageData.PJ_DarksidePointsRequired: Requires {0} points spent on dark side abilities
LanguageData.PJ_NextLevelAlignmentMismatch: The next level requires {0} side alignment. We are {1}.
LanguageData.PJ_CheckStarsForMoreInfo: Hover your mouse over the adjacent stars for detailed information on each level of this power.
LanguageData.PJ_ForceAwakensDesc: {0} has discovered deep within themselves a mysterious power.
LanguageData.PJ_ForceXPDesc: Force XP is gained whenever a character uses their skills. Select skills increase force XP more than others.
LanguageData.PJ_AlignmentDesc: Alignment determines what abilities a character can use. Gray Jedi can use low levels of both light and dark powers. However, higher level abilities require commitment to the dark or light side of the force.
LanguageData.PJ_ForceSensitiveDesc: {0} can feel something stirring within... Utilize their skills and watch them grow.
LanguageData.PJ_ForcePowersUnlocked: {0} has begun to control the force.
LanguageData.PJ_LightsaberOffense_Desc: Increases lightsaber damage by 20% per skill point. All force users start with half damage on lightsabers until leveling this skill. Non-force users can only deal a maximum of 10 damage.
LanguageData.PJ_LightsaberDefense_Desc: Increases chance to block melee attacks and deflect bullets by 15% per level.
LanguageData.PJ_LightsaberReflection_Desc: Increases chances of reflecting deflected bullets back at targets by 20% per level.
LanguageData.PJ_LightsaberAccuracy_Desc: Increases rates of landing lightsaber attacks in battle by up to 20% per point.
LanguageData.PJ_ForcePool_Desc: Decreases force power force pool consumption by 15% per skill point.
LanguageData.ForceAbilityDescChange: Adjusts Alignment towards the {0} side by {1}
